common.DO_YOU_REALLY_WANT_TO_DELETE_THIS_ITEM: Do you really want to delete this item?

errors.BLOCKED_USER: Too many failed login attempts, user blocked temporarely
errors.SERVER_TIMEOUT_CONNECTION_ERROR: Server is not responding, connection error
errors.SUBMIT_EARLY: Wow, you did so fast. Be careful! Please check your answers before submitting.
errors.vn_edupiatutor_mobile_exception_AccessEa:
Hello, 
Are you looking forward to doing your exam? 
This exam is coming soon. You should prepare carefully and access this link on time to get good results.
errors.vn_edupiatutor_mobile_exception_InvalidC: Class code or phone number is incorrect. Please contact teacher for information!
errors.vn_edupiatutor_mobile_exception_InvalidU: Username or password is incorrect. Please contact teacher for information!
errors.vn_edupiatutor_mobile_exception_InvalidT: The link is incorrect or expired. Please contact teacher for information!

messages.min: This field must have no less than {length} characters

home.TITLE: Protected Home
home.DESCRIPTION: This page is only available privately when the users log in with their credentials
home.VERIFY_YOUR_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: You must verify your account by clicking the link sent to your E-mail to be able to enjoy all our app features

landing.TITLE: The web application for students of Edupia Tutor
landing.DESCRIPTION:
Student can use this application to:
- Do homeworks
- Take exams

login.TITLE: Login by student account
login.DESCRIPTION: To login to the system you must enter your username and password.

loginClassCode.TITLE: Login
loginClassCode.DESCRIPTION:
To login to the system you must enter class code and your ClassIN phone number. Example:
Class code: D1A.111222
Phone number: 0979333555

quizAttempt.TITLE: Attempt
quizAttempt.DO_YOU_REALLY_WANT_TO_SUBMIT: Do you really want to submit?
quizAttempt.QUESTION: questions
quizAttempt.SUBMIT_DESCRIPTION: When you submit your answers will be stored in the system, after that you can not update them.

quizzes.TITLE: List of quizzes
quizzes.ATTEMPT_DESCRIPTION: Please note that, when you attempt the quiz, the time will start right after the questions have been loaded.
quizzes.NAME: Name

forgotPassword.TITLE: Forgot my password
forgotPassword.DESCRIPTION: Enter your E-mail address so we can send you a message with instructions to recover your password
forgotPassword.RESET_EMAIL_SENT: We have sent a message to %{0} with instructions to recover your password
